techs.name: Optics
techs.quote: One doesn't discover new lands without losing sight of the shore.

techs.name: Navigation
uniques: Enables [Embarked] units to enter ocean tiles
techs.quote: 'When you have no landmarks to navigate by, you have to get creative.' - Captain Ray Decca

techs.name: Mountain Exploration
uniques: Comment [Enables Scout and Mounted units to enter Mountain tiles]
[Scout] units gain the [Mountaineer] promotion <hidden from users>
[Mounted] units gain the [Mountaineer] promotion <hidden from users>
[Mounted Ranged] units gain the [Mountaineer] promotion <hidden from users>
techs.quote: Each generation makes of the world more or less the kind of place they dream it should be; and each when its day is done is often in a mood to regret the work of its own hands and to praise the conditions that obtained when it was young.

techs.name: Record Keeping
techs.quote: 'And if you believe that drivel, I've got a prime piece of radioactive swampland to sell you!' - Rozalia Nowakalska, Nowa Polska diplomat

techs.name: Chemistry
techs.quote: 'For my days are consumed like smoke, and my bones are burned as an hearth.' - The Holy Bible, Psalms 102:3

techs.name: Education
techs.quote: Hereby it is manifest that during the time men live without a common Power to keep them all in awe, they are in that condition which is called War; and such a war as is of every man against every man.

techs.name: Moisture Harvesting
uniques: Enables conversion of city production to [Gold]
techs.quote: 'For a brief window in history, we controlled all of this world's water and thus, we controlled the world itself. In this era, we must repurpose our methods to aid those who remain in this world - if they will even accept our aid.' - Yuri Vengerov

techs.name: Ecology
uniques: [+1 Food] from every [Wasteland] <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Lakes] tiles>
[+1 Food] from every [Badlands] <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Lakes] tiles>
techs.quote: Modern industrial farming is largely a strategy for turning fossil fuels into food.

techs.name: Biology
techs.quote: If the brain were so simple we could understand it, we would be so simple we couldn't.

techs.name: Steam Power
techs.quote: It is arguable whether the human race have been gainers by the march of science beyond the steam engine.

techs.name: Rifling
techs.quote: There is no struggle for life but, rather, life is lived for struggle. Thus, pacifism is trafficking with the enemy.

techs.name: Hoplology
techs.quote: Much as the bleeding hearts may dislike the fact, war and its culture form an integral part of human history and human life and are likely to do so for all future to come.

techs.name: Replaceable Parts
techs.quote: Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs.

techs.name: Munitions
techs.quote: As soon as men decide that all means are permitted to fight an evil, then their good becomes indistinguishable from the evil that they set out to destroy.

techs.name: Ecotheory
techs.quote: Nature, to be commanded, must be obeyed.

techs.name: Re-Utilization
techs.quote: The incomplete becomes complete; the crooked becomes straight; the empty becomes full; the worn out becomes new.

techs.name: Computers
techs.quote: This has been a challenging quarter with falls in demand from states and agencies. Blackwarden Associates has recalibrated its operations across geographies, moving away from security and relief operations in Asia and divesting from the radiological remediation sector. By focusing on core domestic operations for private sector clients, we have successfully generated free cashflows despite adverse market conditions.

techs.name: Radar
techs.quote: 'Talent hits a target no one else can hit; Genius hits a target no one else can see.'

techs.name: Land Remediation
techs.quote: The nation that destroys its soil destroys itself.

techs.name: Full-Spectrum Dominance
techs.quote: I have said earlier that the United States is now totally frank about putting its cards on the table. That is the case. Its official declared policy is now defined as 'full spectrum dominance'. That is not my term, it is theirs.

techs.name: Nuclear Fission
techs.quote: We knew the world would not be the same. A few people laughed, a few people cried. Most people were silent. I remembered the line from the Hindu scripture, the Bhagavad Gita; Vishnu is trying to persuade the Prince that he should do his duty and, to impress him, takes on his multi-armed form and says, 'Now I am become Death, the destroyer of worlds.' I suppose we all thought that, one way or another.

techs.name: Advanced Materials
techs.quote: Bunkers were spaces of exception, where democratic states could morph into autocracies in times of war by making the decision to sacrifice the polis from this space of protection.

techs.name: Atmosphere Remediation
techs.quote: But the truth is that the alleged climate change crisis is just another cog in a concealed depopulation agenda, skilfully engineered by the powers that be. And the only carbon footprint they want to eliminate, is you.

techs.name: Energy Weapons
techs.quote: I believe that man will not merely endure: he will prevail. He is immortal, not because he alone among creatures has an inexhaustible voice, but because he has a soul, a spirit capable of compassion and sacrifice and endurance.

techs.name: Astrogation
techs.quote: Mankind was born on Earth. It was never meant to die here.

techs.name: Rewilding
techs.quote: In wilderness I sense the miracle of life, and behind it our scientific accomplishments fade to trivia.

techs.name: Stealth
techs.quote: Be extremely subtle, even to the point of formlessness, be extremely mysterious, even to the point of soundlessness. Thereby you can be the director of the opponent's fate.

techs.name: Geo Engineering
techs.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

techs.name: Future Tech
techs.quote: There is nothing like a dream to create the future.
